item.title: Configuring DHCP Relays and Servers
item.description: You can configure an interface so it can make DHCP relay requests for IPv4 and IPv6. item.title: Network Command Line Utility
item.description: The Network Command Line Utility, or NCLU, is a command line interface for Cumulus Networks products, implemented in Cumulus RMP 3.1 and later releases, with the goal of simplifying the networking configuration process for all users. The NCLU wrapper utility is called net. In 3.1 releases, net is capable of configuring L2 and L3 features of the networking stack, as well as providing monitoring and troubleshooting functionality for these features.
